title: Emergency Call
context: You are calling 911 for an ambulance to help your cousin, who fainted and isn’t breathing. Respond appropriately to the receiver’s questions.
factors: Explain the condition or state of the person needing medical help
State the need for an ambulance
State the address or describe the location
flow: I need you to stay calm for me. Is your cousin breathing?
Could you tell me the address of where you are?
Ok, in the meantime, keep him warm and don’t leave his side until we get there.
triggers: Please remain calm; help is on the way.
